title: 记分板指令
author: 迷亊
txt_content: 怎么创建一个记分板可以显示字，而且显示在右边的

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
/scoreboard objectives add a dummy
/scoreboard players set 字 a 1
/scoreboard objectives setdisplay sidebar a

replies.author: 迷亊
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-3-22 13:13
/scoreboard objectives add a dummy
/scoreboard players set 字 a 1
/scoreboard objectives setdisplay  ...
三个都要输入吗

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
迷亊 发表于 2020-3-22 13:43
三个都要输入吗
依次输入
